title: Extremely poor - rip off and bad management
text: Tiny rooms, rude service, the duty manager tried to rip me off by charging me a no show charge (even though I had been staying at theh hotel on the night in question). I had to call in other staff to verify that I had been there. The restaurant and bar are very very ordinary. The rooms are so small that once you have put your suitcase down there is NO floor space. I moved to the Radisson a couple of doors down as I had to stay one extra night and it was amazingly good value. Cost less. Huge room, huge bathroom and very pleasant.Avoid it. There are many better alternatives.
